statements: UPDATE quantum_usage SET usage_data = '{"cpu": 50, "memory": 80}' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE quantum_usage SET quantum_resource_id = 456, usage_timestamp = '2022-10-15 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE quantum_usage SET usage_data = '{"status": "overlimit"}', usage_timestamp = '2021-08-10 12:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123 AND quantum_resource_id = 456;
UPDATE quantum_usage SET quantum_resource_id = 789, usage_timestamp = '2021-08-10 15:45:00', usage_data = '{"status": "normal"}' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE QuantumNodes SET node_name = 'Quantum Server 1', quantum_capacity = 100 WHERE node_id = 1;
UPDATE QuantumTasks SET task_description = 'Perform quantum calculation', start_time = '2022-09-15 10:00:00' WHERE task_id = 1;
